name: giftmanager
description: GiftManager is a self-hosted app for organizing gift ideas, budgets, and purchase tracking for events like holidays or birthdays. It provides lists, budgets, and reminders through a lightweight web UI.

features.title: Purchase Management
features.description: Track which gifts have been purchased, wrapped, and delivered

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications for upcoming birthdays, holidays, and gift-giving occasions

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share gift lists with family members to coordinate and avoid duplicate purchases

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Manage gifts through a simple, intuitive web UI

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep gift plans and budgets private on your own self-hosted infrastructure
